subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The Olympic champion Usain Bolt confirmed he would run the 100 meters at the Diamond League meet in Stockholm in August, setting up a showdown against his rivals Asafa Powell and Tyson Gay.
snippet: The Olympic champion Usain Bolt confirmed he would run the 100 meters at the Diamond League meet in Stockholm in August, setting up a showdown against his rivals Asafa Powell and Tyson Gay.
